reviews.review_msg: He is nice and the mid terms are super easy. If you do good on the presentations, its one of the easier courses you will take.
Had him for BUS341. Unexpectedly unbelievably rude. He would actually embarrass people in front of the entire class pretty regularly.

The instructor: Talks very quietly and isn't engaging which makes class boring. It's also hard to communicate with him because he's not very responsive and answers super broadly when you ask things in person. Shows videos in class. 

Class: Midterm questions are super basic/easy and are basically all from the slides, no need to read the textbook.

was always reading off slides so it felt like they didn't rlly know the content they were teaching. Also rarely responded to ppls questions, kinda just danced around them so the class felt pretty disorganized?? If attendance wasn't mandatory no one would show up 

Easy class overall, low effort
Easy class with one MC midterm and no final. Attendance mandatory. Wasn't a huge fan of the prof.
Straightforward course, no surprises. Good prof, brings lots of real world examples to make sense of material.

Not as bad as I thought he would be from other reviews. The course is straightforward, content is repetitive if you're taking it after the other required business courses though. Kinda boring, but he tried to keep the class engaged and was very easy to talk to. Low maintenance course overall.

I already had low expectations coming into this class, but, this class was far below my expectation throughout all the beedie courses I've taken. Things we get graded on and being taught in class seem very repetitive (esp the three reflection papers- very bs). Highly suggest that you take alternative IB courses bc this is a waste of your tuition.
